Precautions for safe handling

Precautions for safe handling

7.2. Conditions for safe storage, including any incompatibilities
Technical measures
Storage conditions
Incompatible products
Incompatible materials
: Pressurized container: Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Use only with equipment rated for cylinder pressure.
: Do not handle until all safety precautions have been read and understood. Use only outdoors or in a well-ventilated area.
: Do not eat, drink or smoke when using this product.
: Comply with applicable regulations.
: Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 52 째C/ 125 째F. Keep container closed when not in use. Protect cylinders from physical damage; do not drag, roll, slide or drop.
: None known.
: None known.
